attributes.action: Issue replacement medals to persons whose medals have been stolen without the word 'copy'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MOD rules currently state that replacement medals bear the word 'copy, it is requested that in cases where the medal has been stolen and there is little chance of recovery the MOD issue the recipient of the original medal a replacement without the word copy and bearing the recipients details.
This petition is in light of the case of medals being stolen from service personnel.
